mapper.select: SELECT C.CART_NO cartNo, C.CART_AMOUNT cartAmount, P.PRODUCT_ID productId, P.PRODUCT_NAME productName, P.PRODUCT_CATEGORY productCategory, P.PRODUCT_COMMENT productComment, P.PRODUCT_PRICE productPrice, P.CHANGE_IMAGE changeImage, M.USER_ID userId FROM TB_CART C, TB_PRODUCT P, TB_MEMBER M WHERE M.USER_ID = #{userId} AND C.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID AND C.USER_ID = M.USER_ID
